title: Hebrai mi sal thingthi kha i hmu em
lyrics:
Hebrai mi, sal thingthi kha i hmu em,
Zing, chhun, tlaia tawngtaia kha?
A pindanah Zion a hre reng e,
Hla takah saltang m ah se.

Jerusalem lamah tukverh in hawng em?
Hrehawm mah sela rei tak ani lo ve;
Kan Lal ropui takin alo kal dawn e,
Kan nghak reng tur a ni e.

Meipui hlauhawma paih luh hlau suh u,
Sakeibaknei puk pawh hlau s'u;
Pathiannin min chhan zel ang, zam suh u,
Angel-te a tir ang a.

Pathian nung fate in ni, hlau suh u,
Chhanchhuahna ni lawmin zai r'u,
Zion khawpui lam chu thlir chung zelin,
Lal lo kal tur chu hmuak r'u.
